QuestData.Title: Cleansing Our Crevasse
QuestData.Description: As you of course know, $n, the naga remain a serious threat to the region. The time has come for us to drive them back into the sea!$b$bWhen you are ready, Grimfeather will take you to the crevasse where they are preparing a violent assault. Once there, use Maurin's Concoction to teach them a lesson they shall not soon forget.
QuestData.LogDescription: Karnum Marshweaver wants you to use Maurin's Concoction to kill 10 Slitherblade Invaders, 10 Slitherblade Sirens, and 3 Sea Giants.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you dealt with the naga in our crevasse, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Your deeds continue to impress me, $n.$b$bPlease accept this gift on behalf of the Cenarion Circle.
